meaning list.sentence: Don’t waste your time on unimportant tasks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vaqtingizni ahamiyatsiz ishlarga sarflamang.

meaning list.sentence: The land was covered with waste materials.
meaning list.sentence translation: Yer chiqindi materiallar bilan qoplangan.

meaning list.sentence: She watered the plants every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: U har kuni ertalab o'simliklarni sug'ordi.

meaning list.sentence: He waved goodbye to his friends at the station.
meaning list.sentence translation: U bekatdagi do‘stlari bilan xayrlashdi.

meaning list.sentence: The police found a weapon at the crime scene.
meaning list.sentence translation: Politsiya voqea joyida qurol topdi.

meaning list.sentence: She weighs herself every morning.
meaning list.sentence translation: U har kuni ertalab o'zini tortadi.

meaning list.sentence: Western culture has influenced many parts of the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: G'arb madaniyati dunyoning ko'plab qismlariga ta'sir ko'rsatdi.

meaning list.sentence: You can choose whatever you like.
meaning list.sentence translation: Siz xohlagan narsani tanlashingiz mumkin.

meaning list.sentence: You can call me whenever you need help.
meaning list.sentence translation: Yordam kerak bo'lganda menga qo'ng'iroq qilishingiz mumkin.

meaning list.sentence: She asked whether he was coming to the party.
meaning list.sentence translation: U ziyofatga kelasizmi, deb so'radi.

meaning list.sentence: It’s been a while since we last met.
meaning list.sentence translation: So‘nggi uchrashganimizga ancha bo‘ldi.

meaning list.sentence: They spent the whole day at the beach.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ular butun kunni plyajda o'tkazdilar.

meaning list.sentence: Her strong will helped her overcome the difficulties.
meaning list.sentence translation: Uning kuchli irodasi unga qiyinchiliklarni engishga yordam berdi.

meaning list.sentence: The team celebrated their win in the championship.
meaning list.sentence translation: Jamoa chempionatdagi g'alabasini nishonladi.

meaning list.sentence: The bird flapped its wings and took off.
meaning list.sentence translation: Qush qanotlarini qoqib uchib ketdi.

meaning list.sentence: The work must be completed within two weeks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ish ikki hafta ichida bajarilishi kerak.

meaning list.sentence: I wonder what the weather will be like tomorrow.
meaning list.sentence translation: Qiziq, ertaga ob-havo qanday bo'ladi.

meaning list.sentence: The pyramids are a wonder of ancient architecture.
meaning list.sentence translation: Piramidalar qadimiy me'morchilikning ajoyibotidir.

meaning list.sentence: This sweater is made of 100% wool.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ushbu sviter 100% jundan qilingan.

meaning list.sentence: The company has a worldwide reputation for quality.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kompaniya sifati bo'yicha butun dunyo bo'ylab obro'ga ega.

meaning list.sentence: The film was released worldwide last month.
meaning list.sentence translation: Film o'tgan oy butun dunyoda namoyish etildi.

meaning list.sentence: Her biggest worry is about her family’s safety.
meaning list.sentence translation: Uning eng katta tashvishi oilasining xavfsizligi.

meaning list.sentence: The weather got worse as the day progressed.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kun o'tishi bilan ob-havo yomonlashdi.

meaning list.sentence: That was the worst experience of my life.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bu mening hayotimdagi eng yomon tajriba edi.

meaning list.sentence: This book is worth reading.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bu kitob o'qishga arziydi.

meaning list.sentence: The contract must be in written form.
meaning list.sentence translation: Shartnoma yozma shaklda bo'lishi kerak.

meaning list.sentence: You answered the question wrong.
meaning list.sentence translation: Siz savolga noto'g'ri javob berdingiz.

meaning list.sentence: The children are playing in the yard.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bolalar bog'da o'ynashmoqda.

meaning list.sentence: The young today are very interested in technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hozirgi kunda yoshlarning texnikaga qiziqishi katta.

meaning list.sentence: His youth was spent traveling and exploring new places.
meaning list.sentence translation: U yoshligini sayohat va yangi joylarni o'rganish bilan o'tkazdi.
